file_content.text: You can move through the village freely. Just be careful.
Mandalorian. We've been through your training grounds. We survived what your initiates couldn't.
Mandalorian. I've been through your training grounds. I survived what your initiates couldn't.
What are these? You brought the dead here?
Not just any dead. Our dead!
You think you can walk into our village and insult us? Imperial dog!
No... they speak the truth. Our initiates failed, where these people did not.
No... she speaks the truth. Our initiates failed, where this woman did not.
No... he speaks the truth. Our initiates failed, where this man did not.
Welcome to our village. You've earned the right to be here--more than those stooges Moff Yurrion pays us to protect.
What is your clan's relationship to the Moff?
What's your deal with Yurrion?
We agreed to provide space and security for some of his men; he's asked for more, but we will not become Imperial servants.
I meant no disrespect--I mean only to prove myself.
I'm honored to visit.
You've done that. Be well.
I'm not here to prove myself to you. I'm here for proof you're worthy of me.
Lose the arrogance, scum.
There are limits to what we'll take. Stay close to your Imperial friends.
They're afraid of you already. I'm Ensign Verr--the Moff asked me to congratulate you, and pass on a message.
He's transferring credits to your accounts as a gesture of goodwill. A "taste of what's to come" for all his valued allies.
I'll make sure the Mandalorians learn their place, and our enemies will fall.
Tatooine will be ours, soon.
He'll be glad to hear you say that.
Good luck with your operations in the village--I'm sure you'll handle these people adeptly.
Is that all the Moff had to say?
Anything else?
Tell the Moff I don't work for him, and I won't be bribed.
He's trying to buy my loyalty.
Ah--yes. I'll certainly let him know.
I'll give the Moff this: he makes good on his debts.
At least he pays up.
So I'm told.
He also emphasized that he's counting on you to force the Mandalorians' respect, and to eliminate any threats to our security. Good luck.
More outsiders. Last thing the village needs.
